text:
When I'm Without, Without, Without You
There's Nothing To Live For

To Get Through The Night

It's Gonna Be Long
It's Gonna Be Hard

text:
We've Said It Before
Each Time With Different Meaning
I found out Too Late
This is What You Wanted

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
And you know that i’ll be gone in the morning
And I hope that you'll think of me like
I think of you all the time
Looking in your eyes when I see that smile there’s trouble

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
You flip me upside down
We’re both laying on the ground
And I don’t even know you
But I feel like I do sometimes
Looking in your eyes
When I see the smile there’s trouble

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
If I could havе a hundred things
Not one of them could compare to you
And we could take this anywhere
Cause were we’re going
We don’t need no shoes

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
So turn around
And I'll hold my hands up
You know i’m trouble
I’m trouble with you

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text: I was just thinking that it's been three years, when we were discussing to choose the stream for admission, it was day 1 of Ramadan when our 10th results were published. Time do fly :))

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text: Nothin' to say. And everything gets in the way. Seems you cannot be replaced. And I'm the one who'll stay🫂✨

text: Why don't these bathing soap manufacturers add grip to the soap? ʕಠ_ಠʔ

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text: It don't matter how many qualities you have. How good you are. It all fails if you don't know how to respect a woman. You're not a man even!

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
Forehead kiss says a lot! And means a lot!
“It stops here.
With me and you. It ends with us.”

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
It was the proudest I have ever been of you. You
were the only one in my life who ever stood up for me. You were strong when I was scared.
—It Ends With Us

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text: Actually, this dilemma was better enough for six months in the row. Now no more! 😮‍💨 https://t.co/cf5sDTw2Jf

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text: The more people I meet, the more the love for you gets deeper!

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
When life gets you down do you wanna know what you've gotta do?
Just keep swimming. Just keep swimming. Just keep swimming, swimming, swimming.

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
This is good.
Yes, I'm crying.
But it'll feel better. This is just human nature, healing an old wound to prepare for a fresh new layer.
That's all
—It Ends With Us

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
I’ll never be able to respect rich people now, knowing they willingly choose to spend their money on materialistic things rather than using it to help other people.
—It Ends With Us.

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
So thank you, dost, for taking time, To demonstrate your love; 
It's yet another blessing that, I'm undeserving of 👉🏼👈🏼😮‍💨

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text: Someone once told me that there is no such thing as bad people. We're all just people who sometimes do bad things.

You are the decorator of necessaries of existence’ assemblage

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:

Chashm-e-Khird Ko Apni Tajalli Se Noor De

O Sun! Bestow on us the light of  wisdom
Bestow your luster’s light on the intellect’s eye https://t.co/pguWTDsv6j

author: Afanasii Nikitich Nikitin
text:
Woh AfTab Jis Sy Zamane Mein Noor Hai
Dil Hai, Khird Hai, Rooh-e-Rawan Hai, Shaur Hai

You are the sun that establishes light in the world
Which establishes heart, intellect, essence, and wisdom https://t.co/wyCytZxxW4
